key.name: AccessIdRequired
key.value: Please enter a value for Access ID.

key.name: AccountLocked
key.value: You have entered your Access ID or Contract ID incorrectly multiple times. At this time, the ability to enter a Contract ID and Access ID has been locked. Please try again in an hour, or conntact Microsoft to confirm that the Contract ID and Access ID combination is correct.

key.name: DefaultContractError
key.value: There was a problem processing this request. Please try again after a few minutes.

key.name: InvalidContractIdPwd
key.value: There is no contract available for this Access ID and Contract ID. Please make sure the information is entered correctly.

key.name: MapContractAddHeader
key.value: To add a new Access ID, type your Access ID, type your Contract ID, and then click Add.

key.name: MapContractListHeader
key.value: You currently have access to the following Access IDs which are mapped to your Windows Liveâ„¢ ID.

key.name: MapContractRemoveHeader
key.value: To remove an Access ID, click the Remove link for that Access ID.

key.name: PasswordRequired
key.value: Please enter a value for Contract ID.

key.name: RemoveConfirm
key.value: Are you sure that you want to remove this Access ID?
